mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recharge_order (recharge_no, create_time, creator_identity_type, creator_id, recharge_account_type, recharge_account_type_desc, store_id, amount, pay_type, pay_type_desc, payment_subject_type, payment_subject_type_desc, customer_id, pay_up_time, status) VALUES (#{rechargeNo}, #{createTime}, #{creatorIdentityType}, #{creatorId}, #{rechargeAccountType}, #{rechargeAccountTypeDesc}, #{storeId}, #{amount}, #{payType}, #{payTypeDesc}, #{paymentSubjectType}, #{paymentSubjectTypeDesc}, #{customerId}, #{payUpTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: INSERT INTO recharge_receipt_info (recharge_no, create_time, pay_time, pay_type, pay_type_desc, payment_subject_type, payment_subject_type_desc, amount, reply_code, receipt_number) SELECT #{rechargeNo}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{payType}, #{payTypeDesc}, #{paymentSubjectType}, #{paymentSubjectTypeDesc}, #{amount}, #{replyCode}, #{receiptNumber} FROM dual WHERE NOT exists(SELECT receipt_number FROM recharge_receipt_info WHERE receipt_number = #{receiptNumber})
